bibl.title: The Greek Minor Prophets Scroll from Nahal Hever (8HevXIIgr) (The Seiyâl Collection I), with the collaboration of R.A. KRAFT and a contribution by P.J. PARSONS.
bibl.seg: TOV Emanuel, The Greek Minor Prophets Scroll from Nahal Hever (8HevXIIgr) (The Seiyâl Collection I), with the collaboration of R.A. KRAFT and a contribution by P.J. PARSONS. (Discoveries in the Judaean Desert. VIII.)
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1990, 4°, xi-169 pp. et XX pll.

C.R. par Pierre-Maurice Bogaert, Muséon 103 (1990) pp. 369-372. - Alain Martin, ChrEg 65 (1990) No. 130, p. 344. - Karlheinz Müller, BZ N.F., 35 (1991) pp. 276-278. - Olivier Munnich, ThLZ 117 (1992) coll. 588-591. - H.F.D. Sparks, JThS N.S., 42 (1991) pp. 175-177. - Arie van der Kooij, BibO 49 (1992) coll. 232-235. - Natalio Fernández Marcos, JSS 36 (1991) pp. 158-161. - Jean Irigoin, REG 107 (1994) pp. 278-279. - Lawrence H. Schiffman, JBL 111 (1992) pp. 532-535. - Moshe A. Zipor, IEJ 42 (1992) pp. 276-278.
